data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 22726, Version Hash: 59c4b74a4d44e4955a234c8ee027735695c80fc1
data.actual_result: The cancel subscription button takes the place of the close button (dangerous in more ways than one) 😉
data.expected_result: The close button should still be visible, rather than requiring the user to expand the window further
data.short_description: Discord Nitro active subscription hides close button when client is open on half screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Enter Discord Nitro menu in user settings - Shrink the Discord client window horizontally - Notice the close button disappear (cancel button is roughly where it would be) - This also applies to some other tabs (e.g. HypeSquad)
